document_data.name: Raurild Sarpath
document_data.mainbody: '''Raurild Sarpath''' was a merchant working out of Cormyr in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He liked to joke about his wife being very controlling.
document_data.Appearance: His beard and moustache were wispy, with small golden rings in them.
document_data.Relationships: He was in on [[Andemel Graeven]]'s scheme, and had been married for sixteen summers as of {{yearlink|1356}}.{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|2|Realmslore}}
document_data.History: During a revel in {{yearlink|1356}}, Raurild Sarpath joined them late, after the music had ended, and commented about Andemel Graeven's shop. He also became a witness to [[Immult Murauvyn]] trying to collect back taxes on [[Sabrast Windriver]].
